channel.title: PI added steadfast boots and can't wear (gives error)
channel.description:
hi, i just added steadfast, glovian, etc and whenever i click on them to weear this comes up in my cmd.
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at server.model.items.ItemAssistant.wearItem(ItemAssistant.java:1770) at server.model.players.packets.WearItem.processPacket(WearItem.java:58) at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:1 39) at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:1133) at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.Server.main(Server.java:194)

item.title: PI added steadfast boots and can't wear (gives error)

item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

k1ng0frs:

Did you add it the stats and etc in the item.cfg?

Oops forgot haha leme try that.
